requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system - Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer (64 bit)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 / R7 370 - 3 GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Wicca is still under heavy development, so these requirements may change as we optimize the game for its final release
